name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in implementing CI/CD pipelines and cloud solutions primarily using **AWS** and **GitHub Actions**. My technical expertise encompasses **CI/CD**, **Maven**, **Bitbucket Pipelines**, and **AWS CodeBuild**, ensuring streamlined deployments and operational efficiency. With a strong foundation in **Linux** environments and proficiency in programming languages such as **Python** and **Java**, I develop and optimize automated processes that enhance productivity and reduce downtime.
I possess in-depth knowledge of compliance standards, including **SOC 2** and **ISO27001**, and I effectively apply these standards in the DevOps lifecycle. My analytical problem-solving skills enable me to troubleshoot complex system issues efficiently, while my strong communication and collaboration abilities facilitate seamless teamwork across cross-functional teams. My experience also includes a focus on enhancing performance through container orchestration and leveraging modern tools in cloud infrastructure.
